description.en: Rina is very famous in her high school for the gymnastics team, she is a true idol. One day, on the way home, she meets a girl who is about to jump off a bridge that looks exactly like her. It seems that her parents have arranged a marriage of convenience for her and the girl is very unhappy. Rina convinces the girl to exchange places and try to destroy the marriage. But she ends up on her honeymoon in Europe...

biography.en:
藤原栄子

Debuted in 1965 encouraged by her teacher YOKOYAMA Masamichi and became especially popular during the 70s. Her masterpiece is "Uwasa no Himeko", published for over more than 10 years with a total of 31 volumes. She created the original character draft for the anime "Mahou Shoujo Lalabel", as well as some special chapters and illustrations for its manga version and that of "La Seine no Hoshi", which were never compiled for tankoubon.
